alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Montgomery (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 10:39PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Montgomery, northwestern Bath and Fleming Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1038 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cowan to near Winchester. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Craintown, Pecks Ridge, Elizaville, Nepton, Cowan and Sherburne around 1045 PM EDT. Flemingsburg, Tilton and Pebble around 1050 PM EDT. Oakley around 1055 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Poplar Plains, Hillsboro, Grange City, Goddard, Klondike, Wallingford, Wades Mill, Ringos Mills, Grassy Lick, Mount Sterling, Plummers Landing, Prewitt, Camargo, Levee, Muses Mills, Gatewoods Station and Coons Station. THIS INCLUDES Interstate 64 in eastern Kentucky between mile markers 105 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
